item.drop.1: * I bid a quiet farewell&  to the {insert ITEM}.
item.drop.2: * I placed the {insert ITEM}&  on the ground and gave it a&  little pat.
item.drop.3: * I threw the {insert ITEM}&  on the ground like the piece&  of trash it is.
item.stick.name: Stick
item.stick.info: * A leftover item from the&  battle with a CELLIEN.
item.stick.use: * I threw the Stick away.{sleep 20}&* Then picked it back up.
item.bandage.name: Bandage
item.bandage.info: * Bandage - Heals 10 HP&* It has already been used&  several times.
item.toy_knife.name: Toy Knife
item.toy_knife.info: * Toy Knife - Weapon AT 3&* Made of plastic.&* A rarity nowadays.
item.faded_ribbon.name: Faded Ribbon
item.faded_ribbon.info: * Faded Ribbon - Armor DF 3&* If I'm cuter,{sleep 20} enemies&  won't hit me as hard.
item.stone.name: Stone
item.stone.use.0: * I threw some stones at&  the CELLIEN, but they all&  went far away.
item.stone.use.1: * Perhaps I have to use&  another item?
item.strange_paper.name: Strange Paper
item.strange_paper.use.0: * I began by folding the paper.{sleep 20}&* Then, on that side...{sleep 20}&  and another...
item.strange_paper.use.1: * Putting my heart and love&  to it, it became the&  "{color_text `yellow`}PAPER PLANE{color_text `white`}".
item.paper_plane.name: Paper Plane
item.paper_plane.use.0: * I threw the paper plane&  directly at the side&  of the CELLIEN...
item.paper_plane.use.1: * Its attention was quickly&  distracted by the plane,{w}&  therefore showing its core.{sleep 120}{end}
item.hat.name: Safari Hat
item.hat.info: * Safari Hat - Armor DF 10&* A generic safari hat.
item.japari_bun.name: Japari Bun
item.japari_bun.info: * Japari Bun - Heals 20 HP&* Contains all the needs&  for every FRIEND.
item.cellien_fragment.name: Cellien Fragment
item.cellien_fragment.info.1: * It might do something, but&  also not do anything.
item.cellien_fragment.use.fail: * I tried to use the fragment,&  but there was no response.
item.cellien_fragment.drop: * For a brief second,{w} I felt&  the need to keep it.
item.egg.name: Egg
item.egg.info: * Not too important, not too&  unimportant.
item.egg.drop: * It is too but also not too&  important for me&  to drop it.
